long_description: With a butterfly-opening handle, Saf.T.Plus(TM) locking system and a sleek design, this multi-tool will turn bolts--and heads! Saf.T.Plus system locks components securely in place for worry-free use. Spring-loaded needlenose pliers make deployment quick and easy. Open-frame styling and easy butterfly-opening handle was inspired by the bridges of Portland, Oregon. User-friendly lock system makes it easy to access the tool you need--simply slide the lock-release button back to unlock. Other features include: wire cutters/strippers, scissors, bottle opener, can opener, Phillips screwdriver, large and medium flathead screwdrivers. Plus, one serrated blade, drop-point blade, wood saw, awl and parcel hook. Stainless-steel construction and aluminum handle provide the strength and durability for long-term use. Nylon ballistic cloth sheath included.
short_description: With a butterfly-opening handle, Saf.T.Plus(TM) locking system and a sleek design, this multi-tool will turn bolts--and heads!
